title: I Reincarnated So I Became A VTuber - Novel Updates
author: Kaisen Rondo   Sakurazuki Shisei   桜月詩星   芥川輪舞
description:
One day, they woke up and were in a white world. They thought reincarnated into the familiar isekai world, or so they thought, but when they opened their eyes, it was my computer’s white screen. The main character, who was reincarnated as an AI, wishes to be connected to people, so they became VTuber. Sure enough, what kind of AI life, no, Vtuber life is awaiting the main character?

This is a story where they make use of the cheat that they are an AI to be a VTuber, and get involved in various incidents due to being born as an AI.>
